channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 11:50 pm alarm to the Chernihiv region.Creck on subsequent messages.
item.description: 🟢 11:50 pm alarm to the Chernihiv region.Creck on subsequent messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟠 11:44 Attack Dronov-Kamikadzerin of the old part
item.description: 🟠 11:44 Attack Dronov-Kamikadzerin of the old part #m_nikopol_that_nikopol_ territorial This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 11:44 The threat of shelling! Now in Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community Artillery Fire.
item.description: 🔴 11:44 The threat of shelling! Now in Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community Artillery Fire. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 11:43 pursuit of anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Sinelnikovsky rayon- Marganets and Marganets Territorial Community

This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
